context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill to retrieve and display full issue details. The solution must use get_issue or the equivalent CLI issue get subcommand and correctly present key issue fields from the API response.

checklist.name: Correct retrieval call
checklist.description: The solution calls get_issue with the issue key or invokes jira.py with 'issue get <key>' to retrieve issue data from the Jira REST API

checklist.name: Core fields displayed
checklist.description: The output includes the issue summary, current status, and assignee, as formatted by format_issue or equivalent output logic

checklist.name: Description included
checklist.description: When the issue has a description field, the description text is extracted from the response and included in the displayed output

checklist.name: Error handling
checklist.description: When get_issue raises an APIError for a non-existent key, the error is caught and an informative message is printed without an unhandled traceback
